name: Uhuu!
description: Maintenance and development of new features for the Uhuu! ticket sales site and its internal systems.

name: Companies Locations - API
description: System for registering companies and their locations. Used for studying NestJs, Typescript and Docker.

name: Ecommerce API - Serverless
description: This project is a simulation of some of the steps involved in buying a product via Ecommerce. It was carried out to study the architecture and development of Serveless applications.

name: Clinic - Serverless
description: To continue studying the Serverless Framework, this project consists of an API that registers and schedules patient appointments for a clinic with DynamoDB.

name: Correct Activities - Serverless
description: Introduction to the Serverless Framework, this project consists of an API for correcting student activities.

name: Extract Products - API
description: Extracting data from Open Food Facts using files to persist the data in a MongoDB database. A CRON routine was used to extract the data at midnight every day.

name: Valorant Informations
description: It's a game I'm playing a lot at the moment and I decided to do something nice about it. On the site you'll find lots of information about skins, agents, weapons and much more.

name: Games Free
description: I felt I needed to produce something useful and also study NextJs, so 'Games Free' was born! The site is about finding new adventures in free games and having fun without having to spend any money.

name: Sales - API
description: API for registering and selling products. PostgreSQL database used, with the best development practices (SOLID, Clean Code).

name: Tasklist - API
description: API for creating and completing tasks. PostgreSQL database used.

name: Bizsys
description: This was my first professional project: an institutional website using Wordpress and Elementor. It was quite a challenge, as I had never developed anything with Wordpress until then, and I consider it a great achievement.

name: Wildbeast
description: The project Consists of a blog where you can see information about certain animals (only Lobo available). Project carried out to learn Grid layout.

name: Viacep - Redux
description: Application to look up postal codes from all over Brazil! Built with Redux for practice and study purposes.

name: Compliments - API
description: The project consists of users sending compliments to each other.

name: CRUD - API
description: Rest CRUD API for practicing and studying NodeJs.

name: Moderação - Bizsys
description: One of my first professional projects. We built it to replace an outdated webapp made in Blade. Application with the purpose of approving or not approving videos, images and texts sent from OOH (out of home) projects.

name: Black Friday - Mercado Livre
description: AR experience for hunting for offers on the Mercado Libre website and app! Upon entering the AR experience, the user is surprised with a special 3D and a banner with a link to the offers.

name: Behind The Flare
description: Project created for an online event in the United States to inform doctors about GPP (Generalized Pustular Psoriasis). Use headphones for a better experience.

name: Dogs
description: A social network for dogs. You can register and post photos, analyze data from your photos and see other people's photos. Project to solidify knowledge of Javascript and ReactJS and their libraries.

name: PodCastr
description: Project carried out with NLW to practice Typescript with ReactJs. The user can listen to the PodCast via streaming with a customized player, no login required.

name: login-ui
description: I've reposted this artwork from driblle.com for code. Just for studying and practicing Sass and React.

name: Laravel CRUD - API
description: Project carried out for Laravel studies. It consists of a blog with a CRUD of posts and users.

name: Flexblog
description: Css Flexbox practice project.

name: Devhouse - API
description: The API consists of a house rental system for developers.

name: Bikecraft
description: The beginning. One of the projects I learned the most about HTML, Css and Javascript. Bikcraft is an institutional website to promote a bicycle store.

name: Letmeask
description: Project carried out with NLW.Project consists of an application to send questions to streamers.Login made with Firebase, with a Google account.

name: MoveIt
description: Project carried out with NLW.Project consists of an application to send questions to streamers.Login made with Firebase, with a Google account.The Project consists of an application that, from the start of a cycle, you need to focus on and not be distracted by what you are going to work on.
